thread.section_title: Home Zone Furniture Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of Home Zone Furniture | homezonefurniture.com | 15 of 152
thread.title: Talesha
thread.title_full: Home Zone Furniture reviewed by Talesha

author: Talesha
title: Talesha
text:
They are not on commission, so you don't have to worry about everyone bombarding you and being pushy and rude. Larry, Ariana, Sergio were awesome. They were friendly and informative. Wonderful atmosphere!
I had a wonderful shopping experience.
I will go again. Ariana walked with me around the store and took time to answer my questions. Money well spent. Thank you team!
My husband was not with me but when he saw the furniture, he was pleased.
The delivery men were very professional and fast.
